org.lwjgl.stb

Class STBTTAlignedQuad

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTAlignedQuad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class STBTTAlignedQuad
extends Struct
    Quad used for drawing a baked character, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_GetBakedQuad(org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTBakedChar.Buffer, int, int, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTAlignedQuad, int).

    stbtt_aligned_quad members

    MemberTypeDescription
    x0float
    y0float
    s0float
    t0float
    x1float
    y1float
    s1float
    t1float

    • Constructor Detail

      • STBTTAlignedQuad

        public STBTTAlignedQuad(long struct)
        Creates a STBTTAlignedQuad instance at the specified memory address.

      • STBTTAlignedQuad

        public STBTTAlignedQuad(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a STBTTAlignedQuad instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
